sait.bms.managers

Class BookManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.bms.managers.BookManagement

  • public class BookManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    The program has five methods to connect to AppDriver class and Book class.
    Version:
    1.0, Jun 7, 2020
    Author:
    Hong and Kim
